articles.title: Warner Bros. Games Restructures To Focus On ‘Game of Thrones’, Harry Potter, ‘Mortal Kombat’ and DC Universe - Deadline
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery is refocusing its video game unit on four core franchises: 'Game of Thrones,' 'Mortal Kombat.,' Harry Potter and the DC Universe.

articles.title: Hades 2's new update adds in more weapon variations, boss challenges and, oh no, a really hot portrait for Narcissus - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: The Unseen Update has arrived in Hades 2, and it's brought with it a whole bevy of additions, tweaks, fixes, and more.

articles.title: The 42" LG Evo C4 4K OLED TV Drops to the Lowest Price Ever: Doubles as a Gaming Monitor - IGN
articles.description: With a smaller 42" screen size and 4K (104ppi) resolution, this TV fits right at home on a PC desk.
